<MethodEndpoint

Returns a list of users with full information about them matching the parameters specified in the request.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
